name: The Best Pizza Crust
author: Anonymous
summary: This recipe will give you pizza crust that isn't too thick, but nice and soft like you would find at a pizza shop. Dress this crust up with the toppings of your choice.
ingredients: ⅓ cup warm water (110 degrees F/45 degrees C)
directions: Combine flour, salt, sugar, dry milk, butter or margarine, yeast, and warm water
Turn out an a lightly floured surface, and knead until the dough is smooth
Place in a well oiled bowl, and turn to coat the surface
Cover with a damp cloth, and place in a warm spot for 2 hours
Roll out to fit a 14 inch pizza pan
Allow to rise until doubled in size
Bake at 375 degrees F ( 190 degrees C) until crust is a very light brown color
Place desired toppings on the pizza
Bake for 20 minutes, or until toppings are done
